amendment.description: To allow continued funding of the Council on Graduate Medical Education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1640 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1640 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11324) To allow continued funding of the Council on Graduate Medical Education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1640 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1640 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542.
